post:
Hello Everyone,

My name is Jerry and I'd like to invite you to join The Premier Host's May promotions. We currently have coupon code 40off to get a recurring 40% off any Shared, reseller, IRC, or Shoutcast package. This coupon is good for all billing cycles.

We also have coupon code 20off to get a recurring 20% off any of our VDS's or Dedicated Servers. Only good on Monthly billing.

Here is a list of great features that meet your every need.

- 24/7/365 Email (Ticket) Support (average response time is 10 minutes!)
- 24/7/365 Server Monitoring with instant REACTION (1 minute interval checks)
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
- Daily Complete Website Backups
- Dual Xeon Dual Core
- cPanel Control Panel
- Online Webmail and FTP (includes Roundcube, Horde, SquirrelMail)
- CURL, ImageMagick, GD, PHP 5, MySQL 5, CGI, IonCube, Zend Optimizer and more!
- Automatic virus scanning of your emails.
- Word class spam protection.
- Extremely secure hosting environment utilizing several advanced programs (including suPHP) to help prevent spamming and hacking.
- and so much more...

Our starter packages are:

Our Shared packages start at $1.50/mo before coupon is applied and comes with:
1,000MB DiskSpace
50GB Bandwidth
Unlimited E-Mail address, Databases, etc.
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
30 Day Money Back Guarantee
Softaculous
and more
